metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39320 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The go.mod toolchain directive, introduced in Go 1.21, can be leveraged toexecute scripts and binaries relative to the root of the module when the"go" command was executed within the module. This applies to modulesdownloaded using the "go" command from the module proxy, as well as modulesdownloaded directly using VCS software.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39320` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.21 - 1.21.1-1
golang-1.21-go - 1.21.1-1
golang-1.21-src - 1.21.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.21 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.21.1-1').
